data.title: How strong is my friend connection?
data.description: Think of a particular friend in your life and take this quiz to find out how connected you are to that person.

q.text: I feel close to my friend.
I am often angry with my friend.
I would be upset if this friendship ended.
It’s more fun to do things with my friend than by myself.
When I’m upset, my friend makes me feel worse.
I wish my friend was more understanding.
No one supports me like my friend does.
I avoid talking about my problems with my friend.
I know that my friend is loyal.
I don’t like to depend on my friend.
I enjoy spending time with my friend.
I don’t turn to my friend when things get rough.

data.scores:
Your Score

15-24 points = Weak Link

You and your friend aren’t very close and probably don’t share your thoughts or feelings very often. This is probably not a friend you come to when you have a problem. Friends like these can go one of two ways. First, you might not be very happy and want more from the friendship. Or, you might be okay with where the friendship’s at and want to keep it that way, especially if you have other, closer friends.

25-34 points = Cautious Connection

You and your friend are somewhat close. You probably share some of your thoughts and feelings with each other, but there might be things that you are holding back. You might find that putting in more effort can bring the two of you closer.

35-45 points = Feel-good Friends

You and your friend are pretty close. You are loyal and more likely to share your thoughts and feelings with each other. Chances are that you are happy in this friendship.

Keep reading for tips about healthy friendships
